code that some idiot out there wrote or you know alternatively if you know you
don't like the term idiot it's the code that some inscrutable genius wrote and that you're trying to understand and often times that inscrutable genius is
like you from you know a year ago and and you're going back and and trying to make heads or Tales of of what's
going on and really Source graph is about making that code that some idiot
or inscrutable genius wrote feel more like the code that you wrote and understand kind of intuitively it's all

things there's Go please and then there's package site because those are outside of command go itself they're

of just run through the issues and the agenda and it's sort of a nice like
rotational participatory thing we usually have about 20 to 30 total agenda
